backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping UI requirements to frontend files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level descriptions of key frontend files and their roles in the UI and theme.
frontend/index.css: Defines base Tailwind variables and theme tokens for light/dark modes with color and layout utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing the interactive Yes/No buttons and reveal of the success message and image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, login, logout, and identity restoration logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook since no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles defining playful typography, warm gradient theme, custom button styles, and layout resets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, scanning project files, and extending theme colors, shadows, and layout settings using OKLCH variables and custom warm palette.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata describing requirements for a playful Propose Day SPA, including features, styling, interactivity, and image asset needs.
